data.name: familyinformation-tab
data.value: III. Family Information

data.name: lblFamilyMembersLivingWithYou.Text
data.value: 14. Number of family members living with you

data.name: lblMinorsWhoAreParents.Text
data.value: 16. Minors who are parents or are close to become parents

data.name: lblNumberOfMen.Text
data.value: Number of men

data.name: lblNumberOfWomen.Text
data.value: Number of women

data.name: lblNumberOtherPeopleLivingWithYou.Text
data.value: 18. Number of other people who live with you

data.name: lblPeopleDependEconomicallyOnYou.Text
data.value: 15. How many people depend economically on you

data.name: lblScreenTitle
data.value: Socio-economic card

data.name: lbtnBack.Text
data.value: Back

data.name: lbtnNext.Text
data.value: Next

data.name: lbtnSaveAsDraft.Text
data.value: Save as draft

data.name: No
data.value: No

data.name: Yes
data.value: Yes

data.name: msgWaitWhileProcessing
data.value: Please wait while last request completes

data.name: msj001.Text
data.value: Connection error, the application cannot communicate with the database, please contact the administrator.

data.name: msj002.Text
data.value: Connection error, could not connect to the database, check the user and password database, if the error persists please contact the administrator.

data.name: msj003.Text
data.value: The connection to the server has been terminated by timeout, could not perform the operation, please contact the administrator.

data.name: msj004.Text
data.value: The registry already exists, please check and correct the data.

data.name: msj005.Text
data.value: The registry is linked to other elements so they can not perform the desired operation, please contact the administrator.

data.name: msj006.Text
data.value: Error database, one or more objects required are not found in the database, please contact the administrator.

data.name: msgFamilyMembersLivingWithYouValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of family members who live with you

data.name: msgInvalidEntry
data.value: Please check the fields marked on the form, correct the errors and try again.

data.name: msgMinorsWhoAreParentValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of minors who are parents or are close to become parents, that is less than or equal to the number of family members living with you plus the number of other people who live with you

data.name: msgNumberOtherPeopleLivingWithYouValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of other people who live with you

data.name: msgPeopleDependEconomicallyOnYouValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of people who depend economically on you, that is less than or equal to the number of family members living with you plus the number of other people who live with you

data.name: msgUnemployedPeopleValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of unemployed adults (who doesn't receive salary). The number of unoccupied people plus the number of unemployed people must be less than or equal to the number of family members living with you plus the number of other people who live with you

data.name: msgUnoccupiedPersonsLegalAgeValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of unoccupied adults (who doesn't study, who doesn't work), DON'T include the housewife. The number of unoccupied people plus the number of unemployed people must be less than or equal to the number of family members living with you plus the number of other people who live with you

data.name: msjSurveySavedAsDraft
data.value: The socio-economic card has been saved as a draft

data.name: lblMinorsWithEmployment.Text
data.value: 17. Minors who are employed

data.name: msgMinorsWithEmploymentValidation
data.value: You must select a valid number of minors who are employed

data.name: lblNumberOtherPeopleLivingWithOutYou.Text
data.value: 19. Indicate how many children live outside the home
